alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 2:02PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Marin, southern Sonoma and central Napa Counties through 245 PM PST... At 201 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Petaluma, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Napa, Petaluma, Novato, Rohnert Park, Sonoma, Sebastopol, Cotati, St. Helena, Black Point-Green Point, Point Reyes Station, Tomales, Roseland, South Santa Rosa Cdp, Boyes Hot Springs, Dillon Beach, Yountville, El Verano, Temelec and Deer Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
